summary: Completed comprehensive testing of AI-powered Shopify Analytics App. All core features are working correctly including landing page, store connection flow, dashboard analytics, AI assistant, and query history.
passed_tests: Landing page loads with all elements (header, hero, features, how it works)
Store connection flow with form validation and mock OAuth
Dashboard analytics display (orders, revenue, customers, AOV)
Sales chart and low stock alerts display correctly
AI Assistant processes natural language questions successfully
Query history saves and displays previous questions
Navigation between overview, chat, and history tabs
Quick AI question from overview tab
All backend API endpoints (15/15 tests passed)
Mock data generation for products, orders, customers
AI integration with GPT-5.2 via emergentintegrations
